main event: A Captain from Hanscom Air Base observed an unidentified object in the sky over Portsmouth, N.H. on July 24, 1951.
interesting points: The object was reported to resemble a long cigar with a fin construction,Traveling at a speed of 800 to 1,000 m.p.h.,The object appeared dark with a lighter underside and was covered with black polka-dotted spots,No sound was reported during the sighting,The object disappeared rapidly as if it had gone into a cloud bank.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a cigar
witness description: Captain from the 4675th Air Base Squadron and another Captain from the airbase.
